effect.en: Search your deck for up to 2 basic Energy cards, show them to your opponent, and put them into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.
effect.fr: Cherchez dans votre deck jusqu’à deux cartes Énergie de base, montrez-les à votre adversaire et ajoutez-les à votre main. Mélangez ensuite votre deck.

description.en: Its tail has a small brain of its own. Beware! If you get close, it may react to your scent and bite.
